commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Huff* *Puff*

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Everyone!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? Nobody's here.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Where is everyone?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sure they've gotta be around somewhere since the deadline to gather the volunteers is almost up.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Maybe they've all gone to personally ask people to help out?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, sounds like someone's here. Thank goodness there's still someone around.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Hello?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh?! Shioriko? What are you doing here?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I should be the one asking you that. What brings you to the clubroom after school hours? I saw you in here on my way home and came to check on you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I came to apologize to everyone! Um, I figured I should say sorry since I was the one in the wrong. I also want to help them gather volunteers again!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Is that so? Unfortunately, everybody appears to have given up.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: It appears as though they have come to the conclusion that they cannot gather the specified number of volunteers by the deadline.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: It was never going to be possible for mere students to gather 1,000 volunteers for the event.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: While I did think there was a slight possibility, they panicked and got too pushy with their requests, which seems to have ruined people's impressions.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You're talking about the stuff being posted online, right? If you know about it, then the rest of the club members probably do too, right?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Most likely.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But all that talk is just speculation! Didn't anyone explain to them why they're all working so hard to hold the festival?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sure the people posting online just don't understand... I know they'll get it if we just explain everything to them.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Things can't just be left like this. No one's been told a thing, I bet. They're completely misunderstanding her!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: They're saying things like she doesn't understand how school idols feel because she's not one herself. That's not true at all.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: You...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I want everyone to know exactly what drives us to be school idols and why we want to have a School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: All of these people were looking forward to the School Idol Festival to begin with. I just know they'll lend us a hand if we get our message across to them! So that's why...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: You are the only one feeling so insistent about this now, Ayumu. It appears as though your president and the other club members consider themselves out of options.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: If you want to get your message across, you will have to do it yourself. Are you capable of that?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: ...Of course I am!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Would I be correct to assume that this means you will be resuming your role as a school idol?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: W-Well... I said such horrible things to everyone, so I don't know...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Why are you so hesitant after saying such bold things? Just say what you want to do. Lying to yourself will only bring you pain.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I know that you were more passionate and worked harder as a school idol than anybody else in your club. You would not be able to do that if you did not love it.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: So you should just be honest with yourself and do what you want to do. Isn't that why you're here right now? Because you realized this yourself?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Shioriko, I...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I want to continue being a school idol!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I love school idols and everyone in the club! So I want them all to know how I feel, and I want them to know the truth! All of it!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Looks like your feelings have settled. I was waiting to hear you say that. Please allow me to help you as well.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: We will broadcast your feelings and everything you want to say to the world through a video-sharing website.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: We must make haste while you still have that passion burning inside of you. Please write a script of what you would like to say while I make preparations.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Right then, I have finished preparing for the live stream.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sorry for always leaving everything up to you.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Don't be. It's my duty as the student council president to offer my assistance to other students. More importantly, have you finished writing your script?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: After some thought, I don't actually need a script. I'm going to just tell everyone how I feel right now.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: There's one thing that I can talk about with more confidence than anybody else.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: What might that be?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Our club president!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I know her better than anybody else in the whole world, so that's what I'm gonna try to convey to everyonewho she is and the effort she's put into the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I am sure you're the perfect person to articulate this. Right then, I will start filming. Are you ready?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yup!
